title: 磨皮美颜锐化光照去闪烁视频AE/PR插件 Digital Anarchy 2021.8 Win 含Beauty Box/Flicker Free/Samurai等
author: 大众脸
content: 包含Digital Anarchy插件的合集，拥有该公司多个常用插件，适用于视频后期处理，支持Windows系统下的Adobe Premiere Pro和After Effects软件。插件由Team V.R提供，支持一键安装。
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2015 – 2021, Premiere Pro CC 2015 – 2021

included_plugins.name: Beauty Box
included_plugins.description: 人像磨皮润肤美颜视频插件（更新）

included_plugins.name: Light Wrap
included_plugins.description: 扣像边缘模拟真实光照插件

included_plugins.name: Power Search
included_plugins.description: 元数据搜索工具（仅支持PR）（大更新）

included_plugins.name: Samurai
included_plugins.description: 视频智能锐化清晰插件
